text: The Knife () is a 1961 Dutch drama movie directed by Fons Rademakers and was based on the novel by Hugo Claus. It stars Marie-Louise Videc, Reitze van der Linden, Ellen Vogel, Paul Cammermans, Guus Hermus, Cor Witschge, Hetty Beck. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Fons Rademakers
title: The Knife (movie)
